div.h2: is committed to providing our students and the community with the most up-to-date information and resources amid the Covid-19 school closure. Please click HERE to access information concerning school closure dates, student feeding programs, and academic enrichment resources.

div.class: et_pb_section et_pb_section_5 et_pb_section_parallax et_pb_with_background et_pb_fullwidth_section et_section_regular

section.class: et_pb_module et_pb_fullwidth_header et_pb_fullwidth_header_0 et_hover_enabled et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_dark et_pb_fullscreen

div.p: Our chief desire is someone who will inspire us to be what we know we could be.
Ralph Waldo Emerson
Excellence is to do a common thing in an uncommon way.
Booker T. Washington
The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character – that is the goal of true education.
Martin Luther King, Jr.

div.h1: The Marion County School District has a “B” accountability rating for the 2018-2019 school year – Marion County School District Accountability Grade

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_2 et_hover_enabled et_pb_promo et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_no_bg

div.p: Grades, Reports, and anything you want to know about your student can be found here. New parents can find out information about enrollment, academics, and sports offered at our campuses.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_3 et_hover_enabled et_pb_promo et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_no_bg

div.p: This one is for the Teachers. You guys are the heart and soul of this district and in knowing this, we have provided a place where you can find the resources to make your job more easy.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_4 et_hover_enabled et_pb_promo et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_no_bg

div.p: Welcome Students! Login to get all your resources, or just hang out and browse the page to get updates on activities and social events within the school to help you feel more like a person, and less like a student.

meta.content: Oak Grove High School, 5198 Old Highway 11 Hattiesburg, MS 39402 Additional Information: Multipurpose Room
Oak Grove High School, 5198 Old Highway 11 Hattiesburg, MS 39402 Additional Information: Multipurpose Room

meta.meta: Oak Grove High School, 5198 Old Highway 11 Hattiesburg, MS 39402 Additional Information: Multipurpose Room

div.p: School counselor collaboratives will be three hour sessions that provide counselors support in developing ISPs, utilizing Academic Resources, developing Google Docs to support counseling programs, keeping documentation for the Counselor Growth System, innovative programs, data use, developing counseling program goals, career guidance, and documenting graduation progress. Bring your IDEAS! This is a Brainstorming Workshop to include a short presentation of information, guiding questions, contributions to each topic, and discussion. Please bring examples of supporting documentation on topics mentioned that is used at your school. Registration will begin at 8:45am and the meeting will begin at 9:00am.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_5 imageBackground et-waypoint bottom-animated et_hover_enabled et_pb_promo et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_no_bg

div.p: We have an opportuniy to mold the minds of the next generation of leaders for our community. Every single day is a new and exciting challenge in Marion County School District. Parents understand that their teachers spend a significant amount of time with their children. We are focused and intentional about giving these future leaders the opportunity to excel.

div.h1: Excellence is not a skill, it is an attitude.
div.p: Here in Marion County, we believe in striving for greatness, and also awarding those who try day after day to become better, and to change their world. Below is a list of our awards and achievements that our students have earned.

div.class: slide slide1 testimonial_rotator_slide hreview itemreviewed item cf-tr
slide slide2 testimonial_rotator_slide hreview itemreviewed item cf-tr
slide slide3 testimonial_rotator_slide hreview itemreviewed item cf-tr

et_pb_module et_pb_number_counter et_pb_number_counter_1 et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_dark et_pb_with_title
et_pb_module et_pb_number_counter et_pb_number_counter_2 et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_dark et_pb_with_title

div.p: Marion County School District is more than just another district. We are family, friends, and supporters. We teach the students during the day, and cheer with them under the friday night lights. We strive together, we survive together, we excel together, and we stand together. We Are Marion County!
Find out more about the Marion County School District
Designed by Relevant Design Powered by Creativity
